info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Reeves, northeastern Culberson and northwestern Loving Counties through 615 PM CDT/515 PM MDT/... At 536 PM CDT/436 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Red Bluff Reservoir, or 27 miles northwest of Mentone, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Red Bluff Reservoir, Orla and Red Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rain can be expected.
